analyzed: evam kṣānti pratisthitaḥ śrute vīryam ārabheta
anyathā śrutam eva sya vināśāya saṃpadyate

original: kiyadbahū dharmaparyāyuṇeyā [[DOUBT]] śīlaṃ na rakṣeta śrute namanta /
na bāhuśrutyena sa śakyu trāyituṃ duḥśīlayena vrajamāna durgatim //
analyzed: na bāhuśrutyena sa śakyu trāyitum duḥśīlayena vrajamāna durgatim

original: tathā hi kulaputrāḥ śrutavataḥ prajñâgamo bhavati /
analyzed: tathā hi kula putrāḥ śrutavataḥ prajñgamaḥ bhavati

original: bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ sagauravāṇāṃ sapratīśānāṃ anyalokadhātusthitâpi buddhā bhagavanto mukham upadarśayanti dharmaṃ cânuśrāvayanti /
analyzed: bodhisatvānām mahāsatvānām sa gauravāṇām sa pratīśānām buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ mukham upadarśayanti dharmam
bodhisatvānām mahāsatvānām parvata kandara vṛkṣa madhyeṣu dharma nidhānāni nikṣiptāni
dharma mukhāni anantāni pustaka gatāni kara tala gatāni bhavanti

original: dharmakāmānāṃ vimalatejaḥ bodhisatvānāṃ pūrvabuddhadarśinyo devatā buddhapratibhānam upasaṃharanti //
analyzed: dharma kāmānām vimala tejaḥ bodhisatvānām pūrva buddha darśinyaḥ devatāḥ buddha pratibhānam upasaṃharanti

original: parikṣīṇâyuṣkāṇāṃ buddhā bhagavanto devatāś câyurbalaṃ côpasaṃharanti /
buddhâdhiṣṭhānena devatâdhiṣṭhānena ca kāṅkṣāmāṇā varṣasahasram avatiṣṭhante //
analyzed: buddhdhiṣṭhānena devatdhiṣṭhānena ca kāṅkṣāmāṇāḥ varṣa sahasram avatiṣṭhante

original: yāvat kalpaṃ vā kalpâvaśeṣaṃ vā yāvad vâkāṅkṣanti dharmagauravajātānāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ buddhā bhagavanto jarām apy apanayanti /
analyzed: yāvat kalpam vā kalpu aśeṣam vā yāvat vkāṅkṣanti dharma gaurava jātānām bodhisatvānām buddhāḥ bhagavantaḥ jarām api apanayanti
bodhisatvānām mahāsatvānām sarvpakrama bhayāni na bhavanti

original: tasmāt tarhi vimalatejaḥ śrutasaṃbhārakauśalyâbhiyuktena bodhisatvena bhavitavyam iti //
analyzed: tasmāt tarhi vimala tejaḥ śruta saṃbhāra kauśalybhi yuktena bodhisatvena bhavitavyam iti
kim ākāram śrutam bodhisatva vinaye praśastam

original: chandâkāram āśayâkāram adhyāśayâkāraṃ prayogâkāraṃ nirmāṇâkāram apramāṇâkāraṃ kalyāṇamitrâkāraṃ
analyzed: chandkāram āśaykāram adhyāśaykāram prayogkāram nirmāṇkāram apramāṇkāram kalyāṇamitrkāram

original: gauravâkāraṃ pradakṣiṇâkāraṃ suvacanâkāraṃ paryupāsanâkāram avahitaśrotrâkāraṃ manaskārâkāram
analyzed: gauravkāram pradakṣiṇkāram suvacankāram paryupāsankāram avahita śrotrkāram manaskārkāram
a vikṣepkāram avasthānkāram ratna saṃjñkāram bhaiṣajya saṃjñkāram sarva vyādhi śamankāram
smṛti bhajan kāram gati bodhan kāram mati rocan kāram buddhi praveśk
āram atṛpta buddha dharma śravaṇkāram tyāga vṛṃhaṇkāram dāntjāneykāram bahu śruta sevankāram
satya kṛtya prīti anubhavankāram kāyudbilya kāram citta prahlādankāram a parikheda śravaṇkāram
dharma śravaṇkāram pratipatti śravaṇkāram para deśanā śravaṇkāram a śruta śravaṇkāram
abhijñā śravaṇkāram anyayān spṛhaṇā śravaṇkāram prajñāpāramitā śravaṇkāram bodhisatva piṭaka śravaṇkāram
saṃgraha vastu śravaṇkāram upāya kauśalya śravaṇkāram brahma vid
hāra śravaṇkāram smṛti saṃprajanya śravaṇkāram gauravkāram utpāda kauśalya śravaṇkāram
anutpāda kauśalya śravaṇkāram aśubhkāram maitryāḥ śravaṇkāram pratītyasamutpād kāram

original: anityâkāraṃ duṣkhâkāram anātmâkāraṃ śāntâkāraṃ śūnyatānimittâpraṇihitâkāraṃ anabhisaṃs
analyzed: anitykāram duṣkhkāram anātmkāram śāntkāram śūnyatā nimitt praṇihitkāram an abhisaṃs
kārkāram kuśalbhi saṃskārkāram a vipraṇāśkāram svdhīnkāram
vīrya syūraṃsankāram dharma nidhi apti ākāram kleśa vipakṣkāram
sva pakṣa parikarṣaṇkāram para pakṣa kleśa nigrahkāram sapta dhana samavaśaraṇkāram sarva dāridrī pachedkāram
sarva vidvat praśastkāram paṇḍit bhinandankāram ārya saṃmatkāram anārya prasādankāram
satya darśan kāram skandha doṣa vivarja
nkāram saṃskṛta doṣa paritulankāram artha pratiśaraṇkāram dharma pratiśaraṇkāram
ātma para hitkāram viśeṣa gaman kāram

original: yaś ca dharmasaṃbhārayogaḥ sâivâsya jñānasaṃbhāro bhavati /
analyzed: yaḥ ca dharma saṃbhāra yogaḥ sivsya jñāna saṃbhāraḥ bhavati

original: tatra katamo dharmasaṃbhārayogo yêyam alpârthatâlpakṛtyatâlpabhāṣatâlpapariṣkāratā pūrvarātrâpararātraṃ jāgarikāyogam anuyuktasya śrutârthaparitulanatā
analyzed: tatra katamaḥ dharma saṃbhāra yogaḥ yyam pūrvarātr pararātram jāgarikā yogam anuyuktasya śrutrtha paritulana tā
dharma nimna tā dharma pravaṇa tā dharma prāgbhāra tā
a śithila śīlat nikṣipta dhura tā viśeṣa gāmi tā saṃgaṇikā vivarjanam

original: dhutaguṇeṣv acalanatā dharmârāmaratiratatā laukikamantrâsmaraṇatā lokôttaradharmaparyeṣṭitā smṛtyapramoṣatā /
analyzed: dhuta guṇeṣu acalana tā laukika mantr smaraṇa tā lokttara dharma paryeṣṭi tā smṛti apramoṣa tā
avidyā moha tamaḥ timira paṭala paryavanaddhasya prajñā cakṣuḥ viśuddhiḥ
asaṃkucita buddhi tā prabhinna buddhi tā

original: lokâyataśāstrāṇi daṇḍanītiśāstrāṇi kārkhedaśāstrāṇi vādavidyāśāstrāṇi kumārakrīḍāśāstrāṇi jambhakavidyāśāstrāṇi //
analyzed: lokyata śāstrāṇi daṇḍanīti śāstrāṇi kārkheda śāstrāṇi vāda vidyā śāstrāṇi kumāra krīḍā śāstrāṇi jambhaka vidyā śāstrāṇi

original: yāny api tad anyāni kānicin mokṣapratikūlāni śāstrāṇi saṃmohāya saṃvartante tāni sarvāṇi bodhisatvayānasaṃprasthitena parivarjayitavyānîti
analyzed: yāni api tat anyāni kānicid mokṣa pratikūlāni śāstrāṇi saṃmohāya saṃvartante tāni sarvāṇi bodhisatva yāna saṃprasthitena parivarjayitavyānti

original: evaṃ śrutavatā cittaṃ śodhayitum araṇyam āśrayaṇīyaṃ /
analyzed: evam śrutavatā cittam śodhayitum araṇyam āśrayaṇīyam

original: kathaṃ punar āśayasaṃpannasyâpy ugradattaparipṛcchāyāṃ gṛham anujñātaṃ /
analyzed: katham punar ugradatta paripṛcchāyām gṛham anujñātam

original: na teṣām asāmarthye 'pi prakṛtiduṣṭatvād gṛhâvāsasya ca prajñaptisâvadyatvād iti //
analyzed: na teṣām a sāmarthye prakṛti duṣṭa tvāt gṛhvāsasya ca prajñapti svadya tvāt iti
iti śikṣāsamuccaye vīrya pāramitā paricchedaḥ daśamaḥ
